name: METALS FOR BUILDINGS
goal:
METALS FOR BUILDINGS is the alliance of European Metals Associations active in the building sector that promotes the unique strengths of metal products for recyclable and sustainable buildings. Metals are essential in buildings thanks to their highly valuable qualities of strength, stiffness and recyclability.

METALS FOR BUILDINGS MEMBERS:
- EUROFER, European Steel Association
- ECCA, European Coil Coating Association
- EUROMETAUX, European Association of Metals
- ECI, European Copper Institute
- IZA, International Zinc Association
- Nickel Institute
- European Aluminium
- EGGA, European General Galvanizers Association
- FAECF, Federation of European Window and Curtain Walling Manufacturers’ Associations
- PPA-Europe, European association for metal faced sandwich panels and metal profiles
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Single market
euInitiatives: Construction Products Regulation; Waste Framework Directive; Ecodesign (MEErP methodology & Evaluation of the Directive); GPP for Office Buildings project
